definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: draw out (Ar. sal=a draw, esp. sword from scabbard, saliylun drawn sword, new-born child (cf. Frä:75, but also Schulth:Hom. Wurz. 80 f.); Talm. [[שָׁלִיל]], Targum [[שְׁלִילָא]] embryo or abortion);—Impf. 2 mpl. + Inf. abs. [[שׁׂל־תָּשׁׂלוּ]] ´[[לָהּ מִן וגו]]: Ru 2:16 ye shall by all means draw out for her from the sheaves.
